meanings.definition: Having no hair on the head.
meanings.sent1: The baldest man in the room had a shiny scalp.
meanings.sent2: He was the baldest of all his brothers, with a completely smooth head.
meanings.sent3: The baldest guy in the office always joked about saving money on haircuts.
meanings.sent4: Her baldest friend was like a beacon in a sea of hairdos.
meanings.sent5: The baldest mountain peak glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.sent4: His baldest move was to skydive without any prior training.
meanings.sent5: The baldest act of bravery was when he saved the drowning puppy from the river.
